TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TiffBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class TiffBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) format images.

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]位图格式支持帧级缩略图、 多个帧和帧级元数据。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap format supports frame level thumbnails, multiple frames, and frame level metadata. 它不支持全局预览、 全局缩略图或全局元数据。It does not support global preview, global thumbnails, or global metadata. 编码不工作不在部分信任环境中。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)有关部分信任的信息。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.
